li.label: transhumanist ecstatic
li.description: With six artificial body parts, I feel incredible. But can I take this further?

li.label: transhumanist elated
li.description: Seven artificial body parts! It's all I ever dreamed of! So little feeble human flesh remaining, yet I want it all gone or enhanced.

li.label: transhumanist exultant
li.description: I feel like I've finally transcended my weak human constraints. Or is there more to discover?

li.label: transhumanist blissful
li.description: I can't even describe the sensation... Born into weak flesh, only to evolve into a being of chrome and titanium.

li.label: transhumanist euphoric
li.description: I'm untouchable. With my form so upgraded and perfected, mere biological requirements such as nutrition and oxygen seem less relevant by the day.

li.label: transhumanist ascended
li.description: I can no longer be described as human. I love it.

li.label: evangelion
li.description: Indestructable pneumatic joints, layers of titanium alloy armor and thousands of micro-circuits. Artificial enhancement has made me a being unlike any other.

li.label: Ghost in the Shell
li.description: I'm a soul encased in plasteel and chrome. In this perfect vessel, I can truly understand the meaning of living.

li.label: methuselah
li.description: This is the pinnacle of existence. My perfect body will live on forever, long after those that surround me have turned to dust.
